text: First Bank & Trust (FB&T;) was a community and commercial bank founded in Evanston, Illinois that was legally acquired by Chicago's Byline Bank in 2018. FB&T; was originally founded in 1995 by Robert Yohanan, Howard Kain and James Lytle. == References == Category:Banks based in Illinois Category:Banks established in 1995 Category:1995 establishments in Illinois Category:Companies based in Evanston, Illinois Category:Defunct banks of the United States
title: First Bank & Trust
